results.title: [Potential of combined hypoglycemic, antihypertensive, and hypolipidemic therapy in patients with diabetes mellitus and diabetic foot syndrome].
results.text_hl: Combined treatment of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ with meformin or glyclaside with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is indicated to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ having compensated @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 DM@@@ and a small @DISEASE_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcerative defect@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hyaloideoretinal_degeneration_of_Wagner</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536075 @@@Wagner@@@'s stages I-II) in the absence of @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@, @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@.

citations.NLM: Onuchin SG, Elsukova OS, Onuchina EL. [Potential of combined hypoglycemic, antihypertensive, and hypolipidemic therapy in patients with diabetes mellitus and diabetic foot syndrome]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2008;86(8):61-6. PMID: 18819351
